SA15bsa064_u:8: iṣṭasyārthasya siddhiḥ sādhanam. tasya nirvartakam aṅgam. tasya avacanaṃ tasyāṅgasyānuccāraṇaṃ vādino nigrahādhikaraṇam:

SA15bsa064_u:144: samudāyaśabda ekasmin samudāye vācye ekavacanaṃ ghaṭa iti /

SA15bsa064_u:1409: so 'sthāne nirdoṣe nigrahasthānasya niyoktodbhāvayitā na bhavati tathā /
SA15bsa064_u:1410: bhūtadoṣodbhāvanalakṣaṇasyottarasyā- pratipatteritareṇottarābhāsatve pratipādite 'pratibhayaiva nigṛhīta iti nedamato nigrahasthānāntaram /
SA15bsa064_u:1412: tasya tena bhūtadoṣatve pratipādite sādhanābhāsavacanenaiva nigṛhīta iti /
SA15bsa064_u:1414: avaśyaṃ hi viṣayāntaraprāptyarthaṃ hetvābhāsā nigrahasthānatvena vaktavyāḥ,
SA15bsa064_u:1418: " [nyā. sū. 5.2.24] kasyacidarthasya tathābhāvaṃ pratijñāya pratijñātārthaviparyayāt kathāprasaṅgaṃ kurvato 'pasiddhānto vijñeyaḥ /
SA15bsa064_u:1421: iti siddhāntamabhyupetya pakṣamavasthāpayati - 'ekāntā prakṛtiḥ vyaktasya avyaktalakṣaṇā;
SA15bsa064_u:1426: sa evamuktavān paryanuyujyate - atha prakṛtirvikāra iti kathaṃ lakṣayitavyam?
SA15bsa064_u:1427: yasyāvasthitasya dharmāntaranivṛttau dharmāntaraṃ pravartate sā prakṛtiḥ,
SA15bsa064_u:1428: yat tad dharmāntaraṃ sa vikāra iti /
SA15bsa064_u:1434: pravṛttirvā- ityevaṃ pratyavasthite yadi sa sata ātmahānamasataścātmalābhamabhyupaiti,
SA15bsa064_u:1438: ito 'pi na kaścidaniyamāt kathāprasaṅgo yattenopagataṃ nāsadutpadyate na sadvinaśyati';
SA15bsa064_u:1443: sukhādīnāmutpattivināśābhyupagamābhāvāt sarvasya tadātmakasya notpatti- vināśāviti siddhaṃ bhavati /
SA15bsa064_u:1445: 91. atra taduktasya hetordoṣamanudbhāvya vikāraprakṛtilakṣaṇaṃ pṛcchan svayamayaṃ prakṛtāsambandhena aniyamāt kathāṃ pravartayati /
SA15bsa064_u:1446: tatredaṃ syād vācyaṃ - vyaktaṃ nāma pravṛttinivṛttidharmakaṃ,
SA15bsa064_u:1452: evaṃ hi tasya sādhanadoṣodbhāvanena pakṣo dūṣito bhavati /
SA15bsa064_u:1457: na lokaḥ śabdairapratipāditamarthaṃ pratipattuṃ samartha iti,
SA15bsa064_u:1461: ] kathāprasaṅgāt iti idamapi hetvābhāseṣvantarbhāvāt na pṛthagvācyam /
SA15bsa064_u:1468: atrāpi yathoktatvāccintyemeva - kiṃ te yathā lakṣitaprabhedāstathaiva,
